attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to: 'Relax the
    smoking ban to allow smoking and non smoking rooms in hotels
    and bars.'

    Please reform the smoking ban to allow a sensible approach to
    leisure facilities.  There is no real reason not to allow
    owners or managers to decide for themselves what is required by
    their own customers.  I am sick of being treated like a pariah
    when I want a smoke while out for a drink and have not stayed
    in an hotel since the ban.  Tobacco sales are still legal in
    this country and I would suggest the Exchequer would not like
    to lose our tax from same.  We are not asking to go back to the
    50's and 60's but to be included in this society.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
